statements: SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM ResearchProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, ethical_guidelines FROM ResearchProjects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC, project_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM ResearchProjects GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, researcher_name FROM ResearchProjects WHERE LENGTH(ethical_guidelines) > 100 ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT project_name) AS unique_projects FROM ResearchProjects GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING unique_projects > 2;
SELECT MAX(project_id) AS max_project_id, MIN(project_id) AS min_project_id, AVG(project_id) AS avg_project_id FROM ResearchProjects;
SELECT researcher_name, ethical_adherence_score FROM researchers
SELECT research_project_title, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE ethical_adherence_score > 80
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE research_project_id = 101
SELECT researcher_name, research_project_title FROM researchers ORDER BY ethical_adherence_score DESC
SELECT guideline_title, guideline_description FROM ethical_guidelines
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_project_id, ethical_adherence_score FROM researchers WHERE ethical_adherence_score > 80;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, research_project_title FROM researchers WHERE research_project_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(researcher_id) AS total_researchers, AVG(ethical_adherence_score) AS average_score FROM researchers;

SELECT r.researcher_name, r.research_project_title, e.guideline_title FROM researchers r JOIN ethical_guidelines e ON r.ethical_adherence_score > 70 AND r.ethical_adherence_score < 90 ORDER BY r.research_project_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researcher WHERE research_area='Biology';
SELECT * FROM ethical_principles WHERE description LIKE '%ethics%';
SELECT project_name, researcher_id FROM research_projects WHERE researcher_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, researcher_id FROM research_projects WHERE project_id > 2 ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, institution FROM research_projects JOIN researcher ON research_projects.researcher_id = researcher.researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_id, research_area, principle_name FROM researcher JOIN ethical_principles ON researcher.research_area = ethical_principles.description WHERE researcher_id < 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, ethical_guidelines FROM research_projects WHERE project_id IN (3, 5, 7);
SELECT project_id, project_title, researcher_id, adherence_to_ethical_guidelines FROM research_projects;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_description FROM ethical_guidelines;
SELECT project_id, guideline_id, adherence_status FROM project_ethical_checks WHERE adherence_status = true;
SELECT project_id, researcher_id FROM research_projects ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_title FROM research_projects WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_title, adherence_to_ethical_guidelines FROM research_projects WHERE adherence_to_ethical_guidelines = TRUE;

SELECT project_title, guideline_description FROM research_projects JOIN project_ethical_checks ON research_projects.project_id = project_ethical_checks.project_id JOIN ethical_guidelines ON project_ethical_checks.guideline_id = ethical_guidelines.guideline_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT guideline_name, description FROM ethical_guidelines WHERE guideline_id = 3;
SELECT project_title, reviewer FROM project_ethical_review WHERE adherence_to_guidelines = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, guideline_name, description FROM ethical_guidelines WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT review_date, reviewer FROM project_ethical_review WHERE adherence_to_guidelines = TRUE AND reviewer LIKE '%Dr.%';
